column4: I want to copy Fonts to /usr/share/fonts folder but It says i dont have permission, i am the root of this comp??
your user is not root.  You can use sudo to do things as root
are you typing sudo apt-get install /ipodslave/    ?  with a slashes?  That tells the system ipodslave is a directory
mmm, well in any event that's not in the repos.  I suggest you use something that is.  Look in the Ubuntu software Center
what's stopping you?
what version to be installed/
mmm good question.  Lemme have a look
virtualbox-ose  (the others are just features and stuff)
do i have to download some utilities too
no. the package should do it for you
not for virtualbox
thanks
sure
hahaha
I am nervous as i can not find my file
pl dont make fun of me
What file?  I can help you find it :)
I'm not making fun of you.  I just thought the accidental yelling was humorous
wildbat_semi_afk what file are we searching for?
my resume as a .doc file buried somewhere in my system
Is it not .odf ?
ahhh :)
it was .odf but I saved as .doc caz most of headhunters work on MS Office
